item.title: Scratch an itch with bookmeetingroom
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: I’ve worked in a few large orgs and one of the most annoying things to deal with was room booking. Heck, in one large enterprise it seemed to be the main job of multiple admin people. So bookmeetingroom.com is something that appeals to me greatly. A nice simple SaaS that fills a need. It was [...]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve worked in a few large orgs and one of the most annoying things to deal with was room booking. Heck, in one large enterprise it seemed to be the main job of multiple admin people. So bookmeetingroom.com is something that appeals to me greatly.

A nice simple SaaS that fills a need. It was developed by Active Online in Dublin. I think they have a winner on their hands.
